message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. $140 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to spend closer to $130.  Would you be willing to come down a bit?
I understand where you're coming from, Bob, but I'm not comfortable going down to $130. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. How about $135?
